viaduct.travel.drop_denied: Dropping while riding is not allowed
viaduct.speed.change.end.correct: change Speed to %s ticks per chunk
viaduct.speed.changed.toofar: too far away, end speed change
tooltip.viaduct.usage: can color all viadcuts with dye, change transparency with wool and glass, with glowstone-dust change light level (only for Basic & Facade Viadcut).
tooltip.viaduct_facade.desc: A decorative cover for other pipes and cables
tooltip.viaduct_facade.usage: Right-click on any pipe or cable to apply the facade, for compability you can add blocks/pipes/cables in config. can only apply to blocks that have a smaller hitbox.
tooltip.viaduct_linker.desc: Connector viaduct Used as Start and goal
tooltip.viaduct_linker.usage: Right-click to open GUI, shift+Right-click to Open ID Screen.
tooltip.viaduct_detector.usage: Detect Players that drive through it. with 3s cooldwon.
tooltip.viaduct_speed.usage: Right click to change speed (ticks per chunks, Standart 97=32 ticks), shift+Right-click with item/block to set ID, multiple Booster with Same ID chnaged the Speed together.
